content: July 30 U.S. cable operator Charter Communications Inc said on Sunday it was not interested in acquiring U.S. wireless carrier Sprint Corp  leaving the latter's majority owner  SoftBank Group Corp  pondering how to orchestrate a merger.
name: Liberty Broadband Corporation
title: UPDATE 2-Charter Communications says 'no interest' in buying Sprint

content: NEW YORK  June 1 T-Mobile US Inc has built a reputation as a scrappy underdog by offering cell service with no contracts and cheap prices.
name: Liberty Broadband Corporation
title: RPT-T-Mobile’s expanded network has rivals - and suitors - taking notice

content: NEW YORK  June 1 T-Mobile US Inc has built a reputation as a scrappy underdog by offering cell service with no contracts and cheap prices.
name: Liberty Broadband Corporation
title: T-Mobile’s expanded network has rivals - and suitors - taking notice

content: May 7 Comcast Corp and Charter Communications Inc will announce a wireless partnership on Monday  according to a source familiar with the matter  as the cable providers prepare to enter a highly competitive and oversaturated market for mobile service in the United States.
name: Liberty Broadband Corporation
title: UPDATE 3-Comcast  Charter to announce wireless partnership on Monday -source

content: NEW YORK  April 26 Charter Communications Inc will develop and produce original programming with AMC Networks Inc  which is known for the show "The Walking Dead " to differentiate its content offerings  the cable company said on Wednesday.
name: Liberty Broadband Corporation
title: Charter  AMC team up to produce original programming

content: April 17 In 10 days  the U.S. Federal Communications Commission (FCC) will lift a ban on telecoms companies engaging in merger talks  and Wall Street is betting on T-Mobile US Inc  Sprint Corp and Dish Network Corp to be the first ones out of the gate.
name: Liberty Broadband Corporation
title: DEALTALK-U.S. telecoms industry set for M&A negotiations frenzy

content: April 4 U.S. cable TV mogul John Malone's Liberty Interactive Corp announced a complex deal that would help eliminate its "tracking stock" structure  giving the company greater access to the equity market and flexibility to make acquisitions.
name: Liberty Broadband Corporation
title: UPDATE 2-Liberty Interactive to drop "tracking stock" structure in complex deal

title: BRIEF-D. E. Shaw & Co LP reports 5.2 pct passive stake in Liberty Broadband Corp as of Jan 26 - SEC Filing
